170a5(mdo sde): po rnams ni/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan pa la'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba'i byung rgyub sems dpa'i ye
170a6(mdo sde): shes dang ldan pa brgya'i tshor yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/dpe dang /rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bskal pa brgyas nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
170a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams ni/bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o//bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/phyir mi
170b1(mdo sde): rdzog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems
170b2(mdo sde): dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i brgya'i char nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/dpe dang /rgyo'i bar du nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na semos can gang
170b3(mdo sde): dge 'khod pa de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur kyang /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ye
170b4(mdo sde): shes dang ldan pa'i brgya'i char yong nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/dpe dang /rgyu'i bar duShadru nye bar mi 'gro'o//'jig rten gyi khoms mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sems can gadzad k+ta
170b5(mdo sde): 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur kyang /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma
170b6(mdo sde): yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mo 'gro ba nas/rgyu dang dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa
170b7(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thams cad yongs su 'grub pa'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' gang ye shes kyi tshogs la 'jug pa 'di thos
171a1(mdo sde): nas/mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
171a2(mdo sde): rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/gang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa de ni shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa'o//snyoms can thams cad kyi 'das
171a3(mdo sde): pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sems ji snyed pa de dag sems can gcig gi sems kyi 'jug pa gcig la yod par gyur la tshul 'dis sems can thams cad de
171a4(mdo sde): steng du tshad med pa'i sems kyis gang ba gyur te/'dres pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug
171a5(mdo sde): gang dgra yin pa de dag thams cad sems can gcig gi sems gcig la yod par gyur lo/rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad de snyed du tshad med pa'i nyon mongs pas
171a6(mdo sde): gang ba'i sems su gyur na'ang /de la byang chub sems dpas gyur shes rab kyi tshigs gcig bsgrubs pas/sems can de dag gi sems su gtogs pa'i sems
171a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa ji snyed pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad so so'i dmigs pa byung ste/zhig cing zhu ba rnams shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi tshogs bskyed par
171b1(mdo sde): bya'o//shes rab des kyang sems can de dag gi sems su snang ba dang /nyon mongs par snang ba dus gsum dang ldan pa gang yang mi shes pa med do//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste
171b2(mdo sde): dper na/nam mkha' 'dis ma khyab pa gang yang med do//de bzhin du byang chub sems depa'i shes rlo ba 'das kyang sems can de dag gi sems su snang ba 'am/nyon mongs par
171b3(mdo sde): snang ba dus gsum dang ldan pa de dog gsal bar ma gyur pa 'am yongs su mi shes pa med de/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o//de la byang
171b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad bsags pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa
171b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad bsags pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i tshogs mi
171b6(mdo sde): zad pa'o//dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dmigs pa dang /sbyor ba bsags pa gang yin pa dge
171b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed pa'i tsho gas gang dag gis/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par
172a1(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya ste/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par blang ba'o//btsun pa shA
172a2(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa gang /lus kyi dge ba'i las kyi rten dang /ngag gi dge ba'i las kyi rten dang /yid kyi dge ba'i las kyi//
172a3(mdo sde): rten to//de ci'i phyir zho na/brtson 'grus gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus dang /ngag dang sems dang ldan pa'i phyir te/lus dang /ngag gi brtson 'grus pas sems kyi
172a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus nyid mchog ces bshad do//de la sems kyi brtson 'grus gang zhe na sems kyi 'jug pa dang /sems gnas pa ste/de la sems kyi 'jug pa gang zhe na gang byang
172a5(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi rtsom pa'o//de la sems gnas pa gang zhe na gang byang chub kyi sems nye bar ma zhi ba'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang sems can rnams la snying rje tsho ba'o//
172a6(mdo sde): sems gnas pa gang zhe na gang bdag med pa la bzod pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang sems can thams cad sdud pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang chos thams cad mi/
172a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/glang 'khor ba na mi skyo ba'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/khams gsum pa mi dmigs so//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/bdog pa thams
172b1(mdo sde): cad yongs su gtong ba'o//gang sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang bslab pa yang dag par len pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang bslab pas rlom
172b2(mdo sde): sems su mi byed pa'o//de la 'jog pa gang zhe na/bzod cing mi mjed pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang sems la rma mi 'byin pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang dge ba'i rtsa ba
172b3(mdo sde): thams cad rtsom pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang sems dben pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang bsam gtan yang dag par bsgrub pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang sems
172b4(mdo sde): la nges par sems pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang thos pa la chog mi shes pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang tshul bzhin sbyor ba'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang ji skad
172b5(mdo sde): thos pa bzhin du chos ston pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang brjod du med pa'i chos nyid do//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'o//gnas pa gang zhe
172b6(mdo sde): na/gang spros pa shin tu chad pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams sogs pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang yang dag pa'i shes pas btang snyoms pa'o///
172b7(mdo sde): de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang mngon par shes pa la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang zag pa med pa la 'dres par byed pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/
173a1(mdo sde): dang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa skyed pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang dran pa i la byaM ba meng ba'o//daM pa rdzug pa ga zhe na/gang yang dag pa spyod pa la stso
173a2(mdo sde): ba'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang dge ba dang maud de ba'i sems dang bral ba'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon par bsgrub pan//gnas bla
173a3(mdo sde): na/gang lhun gyis grub par bya ba la 'jug pa'o///de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gAng dbang po lwa mkhas pa'o//ka/saM maM gang zhe na/kat+ta dzaHdza po midza rdzing chos la rtog pa'o//

173a5(mdo sde): dag par 'byung ba'o//bdas pa gang zhe na/gang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes pa mkhas pa'i ye shes so//de la 'jug wau mdzan naM/grang lam gyi nas tshul
173a6(mdo sde): ba'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang gar yang myi 'gro ba'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gung zhi gnas tshul lo//gnas bkang zhen/ga zhen/sa kyi ma zas zhin no//de la
173a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang lhag mthong spyod pa'o//gnas pa kaMng zhe na//gang chos nyid shes pa'o////de la 'jug pa ga/bshed//ga sa mo//gnas pa
173b1(mdo sde): gang rgyu kun shes pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang gzhan gyi sgra thos pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang chos la nan tan byed pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/lus kyi rgyan to//gnas
173b2(mdo sde): pa gang zhe na/gang lus kyi chos nyid do//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang ngag gi rgyan to//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang 'phags pa'i mi smra ba'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang rna
173b3(mdo sde): par thar pa gsum la mos pa'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang byed pa med pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe nani/gang bdud bzhi yongs su spong ba'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang bag chags

173b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/gang rtsom mar lta ba'i//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang nyams su lon par byed pa'o//de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang brdar lta ba'o//gnas pa gang zhe na/gang don dam
173b6(mdo sde): bar lta ba ste/'di ni sems kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o//de la sems kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/gang 'jug pa thams cad gnas pa dang
173b7(mdo sde): mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba dang /de mtshan mi'i las thams cad du'ang 'jug la/ye shes kyi las la'ang gnas pa ste/de las thams cad kyang ye shes kyis bya ba byed
174a1(mdo sde): pa//la byang chub sems dpa'i mi shes kyi las/shen/gang dge ba'i ba'i rgyu dang /sems can pA s+yA nga la sgying rje chen rnamasas sa /
174a2(mdo sde): gasbyo zhing /sangs rgyas kye mo shes kyi rgyur 'dus ma byas su mi snang ba ste/'din byeng chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin de me zad pa zhes bya'o//brtson 'grus
174a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa skrun pa na/lha dang /mi'i skye dgu khrag khrig bdun nu rje drug blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//byang chub sems
174a4(mdo sde): dpa' stong phyug sum cu du gnyis kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad
174a5(mdo sde): sa smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa 'di ni/khyod kyis legs par smrason/rigs kyi bla byang chub sems dpa' rnams
174a6(mdo sde): bas mi gtan mi zud pa la brtsams te/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams byas ma gtan mi zud par 'gyur ba khyod spongs par gyis shig/blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/
174a7(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam garten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa ni/rnam pa'o drug ste/de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad
174b1(mdo sde): med do//de la rnam pa bcu drug po dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan

174b3(mdo sde): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan no snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'o//'dod pa'i khams su dmigs pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni nying

174b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpo' rnams kyi bas ma gA tAn ni/bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar ba dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms para'i jug pa dang /ltung ba thams ca
174b7(mdo sde): pa'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bas mi gtan no ni ba dang rab tu ni //
175a1(mdo sde): shin tu mthangar thug pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byasam gtan ni mi 'khrugs pa'o//nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams
175a2(mdo sde): legs par 'joms pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni log par bsgrub pa'i gnyen po'o//'jig rten thams cad las bsgral ba'i phyir/byang chub sems

175b1(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas rnams la med pa'o//de la bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/gang mngon par shes pa dang /ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de la mngon par shes pa ni
175b2(mdo sde): grang /ye shes ni gang zhe na/glang gis gzugs su snang ba thams cad mthong ba 'di ni/mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang gis gzugs thams cad kyi chos nyid mi zad par shes kyang

175b5(mdo sde): gong sems 'gog par shes la sems 'gog pa mngon sum du 'dra mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gang sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' rjes su dran pa 'di ni mngon par shes

175b7(mdo sde): dri na mo mkha' dang mtshungs par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o//gang dbyer med pa'i chos 'dod pa 'di ni/mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//gang chos thams cad mnyam par

176a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad dang /ma 'dres par shes pa 'di ni ye shos zhes bya'o//gang brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni mngon par
176a3(mdo sde): shes pa zhes bya'o//gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi bor shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya ste/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
176a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o//yang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /sems g.yeng ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan
176a5(mdo sde): gyi tshogs dang /sems bzhag po shes pa 'ong de snyed de/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /sems g.yeng ba ji snyed po de snyed du/byang chub sems drabs kyang //
176a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o//mnyam pa nyid de la gnas pas na/de'i phyir mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o//sems can mnyam pa nyid dang
176a7(mdo sde): sems mnyam pa nyid dang /bsam pa mi nyam po nyid dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang /spyi ring mnyam pa nyid dang rno sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa
176b1(mdo sde): dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas na/de'i phyir mnyam par bzhag pa zhes
176b2(mdo sde): bya'o//ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam mo//byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo//sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam
176b3(mdo sde): po chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa mtshan ma med pa'ang

176b5(mdo sde): mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa smon pa med pa'ang de dang mnyam mo//smon pa med pa gang dang
176b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo//sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir
176b7(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//smon pa med pa gang dang mnyam pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang do dang mnyam mo//mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa/sems can thams cad kyang de dam mnyam mo//
177a1(mdo sde): sems/na rnams ca gung dang mnyam pa/ thams cud \u0f7fnga de dpya mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir snyoms par
177a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa zhes bya'o//mngon 'du mi byed po zhing dang mnyam pa mi /re dang mnyam mo//mi skye ba gang dang mnyam po sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo//sems
177a3(mdo sde): can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na//de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//mi skye
177a4(mdo sde): ba gang dang mnyam pa mi 'byung ba'ang de dang mnyam mo//mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa sems tsun+da thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo//sems can thams nad gang dang mnyam pa
177a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa dngos po
177a6(mdo sde): med pa'ang de dang mnyam mo//dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo//sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad
177a7(mdo sde): kyang de dang mnyam ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa rnam par dag pa'ang /
177b1(mdo sde): de dang mnyam mo//rnam par dag pa gang dang mnyam pa sems n+dan thams cad kyang daM dang mnyam mo//sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mAnyam
177b2(mdo sde): ste/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//rang gi sems mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyem pa nyid de de
177b3(mdo sde): la zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//phan par byed pa dang /phan paro mi byed pa thams cad la snyoms shing /sa dang mnyam pa'i sems/chu dang mnyam
177b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems/me dang mnyam pa'i sems/rlung dang mnyam pa'i sems/nam mkha' dang mnyam po'i sems te/mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas shing mi g.yo bar gyur pa/
177b5(mdo sde): spyod lam thams cad du mnyam par bzhag pa/spyod lam ma bcos pa/rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa/mi rgod pa dang /mi g.yeng ba/mu tser mi smra ba/tshig ma 'tshal
177b6(mdo sde): baM/don shes pa/chos shes pa/dus shes pa/tshong shes pa/dus min shes pa/'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su snyegs shing /'jig rten dang mi 'dres pa/'jig
177b7(mdo sde): rten gyi chos brgyad las 'das pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/'du 'dzi'i nang na'ang spyod lam dben pa ste/de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
178a1(mdo sde): dpa' ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dod la/'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du'ang snang ste/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/byang chub sems
178a2(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs dang /shes rab kyi mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i thibs ni gang /shes rob ni gang zhe na/gang
178a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa na/sems can+da la lci ba'i phyir/stong rje chen po'i dmigs po la sems 'dogs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs zhes
178a4(mdo sde): bya'o//gang zhi ba dang rab tu zhi bar bsam gtan du byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa ni/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton pa
178a5(mdo sde): 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang cho sa gang la'ang mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na//dam pa'i chos
178a6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba la lta ba 'di ni de'i thabs so//grang chos kyi dbyings me par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa'i
178a7(mdo sde): /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang chos kyi sku dbyer med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rang //gang byang chub sems dpa
178b1(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhog pa na/sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs la sems pa de ni de'i thabs so//gang chos nyid brjod du med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang
178b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na sems rdo rje lte bu byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang rang bzhin gyis g.yeng ba med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//
178b3(mdo sde): gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/sngon gyi smon lam gyis sems can yongs su smin par byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang sems can thams cad lo bdag med par bsam
178b4(mdo sde): gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/dge ba'i rtsa bo thams cad la lhag par dmigs te/bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang dge ba'i
178b5(mdo sde): b+h+rUMrdza ba'i gnas nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni
178b6(mdo sde): de'i thabs so//gang zhig nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dmigs pa
178b7(mdo sde): mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gong mnyam par gzhog pa na/chos kyi 'khor ro//
179a1(mdo sde): rab tu bskor bar 'dod pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang bskor ba'ang med/mi bskor ba'ang med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo//gang byang chub sems
179a2(mdo sde): dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs la rnam par mi g.yeng ba mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so//gang nyon mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung
179a3(mdo sde): ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa sems dang ldan pa dang /sems dang mi ldan po dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du shes yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa de dag yongs
179a4(mdo sde): su bsngal ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nges par gyur pa dang /'thun par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab ste/de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
179a5(mdo sde): dpa' ni/bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa yin no//bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed cing /de la sangs rgyas kyi tshogs thams cad kyi snod kyang nye bar
179a6(mdo sde): gnas pa yin te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo//bsam gtan mi zad pa zhi ba 'di bstan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong nyi ma'i sgron pa'i///
179a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de'i nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya zhe na/'di lta ste dper ni/nyi ma 'tshor ba na zla ba dang /skar ma'i sgron ma dang /mar me'i
179b1(mdo sde): smyon ma dang /rtswa'i ma'i sgron ma thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thob na/ma rabs dang /nyi tshe ba'i shes
179b2(mdo sde): rab thams cad shes rab kyi snang bas zil gyis mnan te/slob pa dang /mi slob po thams cad kyi shes rab dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /de ma yin pa gzhan
179b3(mdo sde): sems can phal pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyang shes rab kyi snang bas zil gyis gnon pas na/de'i phyir nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
179b4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ting nge 'dzin rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mngon por bsgrubs te/de dag la phyogs tsam zhig bstan to//glog gi sgron
179b5(mdo sde): mas brgyan dong zla ba'i 'od//dge bkod rnam snang de bzhin bsam mi khyab//'phags par snang dang dri ma med pa dang //chos rnams kun la dbang byed yon tan 'od//myi
179b6(mdo sde): ngan med dang brtul zhugs grub pa dang //grags pa brten dang kun nas 'phags pa dang //chos kyi sgran ma chos dpal lhun po che//chos kyi dbang phyug tshos shes dbang byed pa
179b7(mdo sde): chos kyi phung po rnam par 'thor ba dang //chos rnams 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa dang //pha rol sems kyi spyod pa spyod pa dang //rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan nyon mongs sol/
180a1(mdo sde): bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams rab tu 'joms pa dang //stobs bcu 'phags pa stobs dang ldan pa dang //chags med chags pa shin tu gcod pa dang /
180a2(mdo sde): lag na sgron ma shin tu sgra bsgrags dang //sa 'dzin dang ni brtan pa'i rang bzhin dang //lhun pa sgron ma mi phe mi rgyal ba dang //shes rab skyed dang ye shes tra lA la/
180a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan 'byung ginas mtha' yas dbang byed dang //sems rnams las su rung bar byed pa dang //byed dang byas dang tshor byed med pa dang //chu yi zla ba nyi ma'i dbyangs
180a4(mdo sde): dag dang //ting 'dzin mi gtong bdud rnams 'joms pa dang //rnam pa sna tshogs 'du shes med pa dang //steg dang glang po shin tu dul ba dang //rgyal ba kun gyi rjes
180a5(mdo sde): su dran pa dang //chos dran dge 'dun ye shes dbang byed dang //mi ldog pa dang ldog pa med pa dang //mig mi 'dzum dang bdag med rab dag dang //rtag tu stong pa'i rnam
180a6(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dang //rtag tu mtshan med rtag tu mi smon dang //gnas par bsam gtan byed pa mi chags dang //rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o//mngon par 'phags /
180a7(mdo sde): dang nges par bcom pa dang //kun nas 'khyil dang rnam par dag pa dang //nges par semos dang nyon mongs bral ba dang //yongs pa nam mkha' lta bu zhes kyang bya//
180b1(mdo sde): bzung ba rnyang ni yon tan 'jug pa dang //dran rtogs blo gros shes rab sgrub pa dang //spobs pa dag ni mi zad byed pa dang //sgra stong pa dang don pa mthong ba dang //'dzin pa zhes
180b2(mdo sde): kyang bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin//chud mi za dang legs byas sbyin pa dang //'gro ba tshim par byed dang bltar mi mtho ba//rab tu rtogs dang draga' mgu skyed pa dang //byams pa 'phags
180b3(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag dang //snying rje chen po'i rtsa bo bas mo dag pa//dga' ba'i rnam par dag la 'jug pa dang //bta snyoms gnyis la tshags las grol ba dang //chos don
180b4(mdo sde): chos bye ye shes ta la la//mi 'khrugs pa dang ye shes rgya mtsho dang //'gro ba tshi mi byed rnam par dul ba dang //rnam par grol ba'i ye shes dbang byed dang //rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan
180b5(mdo sde): snying po'i pad+ma dang //pad+ma 'das dang 'jig rten chos bral dang //mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i cing 'dzin dang //rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dag dang //dpa' bor 'gro zhes bya ba'i ting nge
180b6(mdo sde): 'dzin//sangs rgyas dgongs dang de bzhin mi 'khrugs dang //gzi brjid can dang gzi brjid 'od zer dang //rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mchog sbyin dang //sangs rgyas rgyan rnams
180b7(mdo sde): shin tu bkod pa dang //kun tu snang dang sangs rgyas zhing dag dang //sems can bsam pa rab tu 'jug pa dang //mgu byed shin tu mgu byed ting 'dzin dang //byang chub
181a1(mdo sde): lam gyi rjes su mthun pa dang //pha rol phyin brgyan gtsug na rin po che//byang chub yan lag me tog sbyin pa dang //rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu sbyin pa ste//mi
181a2(mdo sde): 'chi dbyangs dang dmigs med rlung bzhin 'gro/rin chen mtha' dang rgya mtsho'i shugs 'dzin dang //ri dang brag rnams rdob par byed pa dang //rdzu 'phrul don chen yang dag bskyed pa
181a3(mdo sde): dang //sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa mthong ba dang //thos pa thams cad 'dzin dang mi g.yeng dang //skad cig gcig la ye shes sbyin pa dang //yon tan mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam
181a4(mdo sde): par dag/de ltar ting 'dzin 'di dag mtha' yas dpag med de//bsam gtan bye ba khrag khrig dag gi pha rol song //byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab 'jigs med
181a5(mdo sde): pa//brtan mchog sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin rnam dag rtogs//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan mi zad pa zhes bya'o//de nas
181a6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan mi zad pa 'di
181a7(mdo sde): ni khyod kyis legs par smras na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab mi zad pa la brtsams te/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab mi zad par
181b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba khyod spobs par gyis shig/blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad pa yin te/shes rab de'i rnam pa
181b2(mdo sde): niji lta bu 'jug pa ni ci zhe na/thos pa ni rnam pa'o//tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o//thos pa'i yang rnam pa ni ji lta bu 'jug pa ni ci zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
181b3(mdo sde): thos pa'i rnam pa ni ci zhe na/brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/'di lta ste/'dun pa'i rnam pa dang /bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang /dge
181b4(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang /nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang /bag yod pa'i rnam pa dang /gus par byed pa'i rnam pa dang /mthun par 'dzin pa'o rnam pa dang /bka' blo
181b5(mdo sde): bde ba'i rnam pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang /rna ba blags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang /rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i rnam pa dang /gnas kyi
181b6(mdo sde): rnam pa dang /rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /sman du 'ung shes pa'i rnam pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang /
181b7(mdo sde): rtogs pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang /blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang /blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /gtong ba spel
182a1(mdo sde): pa'i rnam pa dang /dul zhi cang shes pa'i rnam pa dang /mang du rdos pa la bston pa myem pa dang / m+b+hir du byas te dga'ang myong bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /
182a2(mdo sde): lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang /sems rab tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /nan tan nyan pa'i
182a3(mdo sde): rnam pa dang /gzhan gyis bstan pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /chos ma thos pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med
182a4(mdo sde): pa'i rnam pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /thabs mkhas pa
182a5(mdo sde): nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /tshangs po'i gnas nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /dran pa dang shes bzhin nyin pa'i rnam pa dang /skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /mi skye ba la mkhas
182a6(mdo sde): panyan pa'i rnam pa dang /mi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang /byams pa'i rnam pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang /mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa/
182a7(mdo sde): dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /mngon pa 'i ng+ga
182b1(mdo sde): pa dang /dag pa don pa byu Sh+TA sh+tsa nga/ sa sbyi / 'ang/ dang /rlungs na las pa'i rnam phyung /
182b2(mdo sde): ring gi sems srung ba'i rnam pa dang /brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'i rnam pa dang /chos la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang /rang gi phyogs
182b3(mdo sde): srung ba'i rnam pa dang /pha rol gyi phyogs dang /nyon mongs pa tsher gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /nor bdun yang dag par 'ang ba'i rnam pa dang /dbul ba thams cad tshar gcong ngo ming /
182b4(mdo sde): rnam pa dang /mdzangs pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang /mkhas pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /'phags pas kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang //'phags pa ma yin pa dang par
182b5(mdo sde): byed pa'i rnam pa dang /bden pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang /phung po'i skyon rnam par spang ba'i rnam pa dang /'angs byas yongs su 'dus pa'i nus pa dang /don la rton pa'i rnam pa dang
182b6(mdo sde): chos la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /ye shes la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i rnam pa da /sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag nga glazhan/
182b7(mdo sde): kha phan pa'i rnam pa dang /legs par byas pa'i las kyi rnam pa dang /mi 'arjod pa'i nus pa dang /khyad par du 'gro ba'i rnam pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'job pa'i
183a1(mdo sde): ste/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa rnam pa bArmad cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya'o//btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi na
183a2(mdo sde): bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang /lhag mthong rnam par dpyod pa'o//
183a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /sems las su rung ba'i 'jug pa dang /lus dben pa la 'jug pa dang /sems dben pa la 'jug pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang //
183a4(mdo sde): bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa la 'jug pa dang /tshad pa med pa la 'jug pa dang /rtag pa med pa la 'jug pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang /bdag med pa dang /sems
183a5(mdo sde): can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang /'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /gnas med pa la 'jug pa dang /mi 'pho zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu chung mi
183a6(mdo sde): za ba la 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la 'dris par byed pa la 'jug pa dang /spyong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
183a7(mdo sde): ba la mngoni sum du mi byed pa la 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa skyed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan dang /
183b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba la 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang /zag bzod pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa ma yin
183b2(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa dang /nang du rtog pa la 'jug pa dang /nges par gyur par mi 'jug pa la 'jug pa dang /'dus byas kyi skyon yongs su 'jal ba la 'jug pa dang /'dus ma byas
183b3(mdo sde): kyi chos mngon sum du mi byed par 'jug pa dang /sems can thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa la 'jug pa dang /snying rje chen po mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang /skyeb
183b4(mdo sde): thams cad 'jigs par lta ba la 'jug pa dang /rtag tu bsams bzhin du shes pas skyid pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'jug pa dang /yid byung zhing 'dod chags dang bral
183b5(mdo sde): bar 'jug pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed par 'jug pa dang /'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yon tan yal bar 'dor ba la 'jug pa dang /chos kyi dga'
183b6(mdo sde): ba mi gtor ba la 'jug pa dang /spros pa dang rnam par rtogs pa thams cad spong ba la 'jug pa dang /thabs mkhas pa'i spros pa dang /rnam par rtog par mi sbyong bar 'jug pa ste/btsun/
183b7(mdo sde): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa'o//btsun pa sha ra dwa ti ri bu gzhan yang tshul bzhin
184b1(mdo sde): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go//de ni dus gsum yongs su ma chang pa'i tshig go/de ni gzugs la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go/den tshor ba dang /'du shes
184b2(mdo sde): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go/de ni so'i khams la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go/de bzhin du de ni chu
184b3(mdo sde): khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par shes pa mi gan skye ba'i tshig go/de ni mig dang gzugs dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas
184b4(mdo sde): 'i tshig go/de bzhin du de ni rna ba dang /sgra dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna dang /dri dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce dang /ro dang
184b5(mdo sde): g+ha'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus dang /reg bya dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khrims dang /yid dang /chos dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la
184b6(mdo sde): mi gnas pa'i tshig go/de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go//de ni chos la rton pa'i tshig go/de ni yi zhes la rton pa'i tshig go//de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig go//
184b7(mdo sde): rjen pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad //de ci'i phyir zhe na/ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du/chos thams cad rigs pas mtho
185a1(mdo sde): zhing /ji ltar sems can pa bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rigs pas mthong na/de ltar mthong ba ni tshul bzhin mthong ba'o//'khor ba
185a2(mdo sde): khams kyi/tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul bzhin yang de yin no zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing bye brag med par mthong ba de ni tshul bzhin rab
185a3(mdo sde): tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o//gang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang /rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin mtshungs shing bye brag med por mthong ba de ni/tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor
185a4(mdo sde): bo zhes bya'o//gang rigs pa dang /mi rigs par mi sems pa de ni tshulnga bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mdor na/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
185a5(mdo sde): bzhin sbyor ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas ni sems can no//de sems can gyi gnas kyang mi spong la/chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrugs par mi byed de/de ni byang chub
185a6(mdo sde): sems da pa'i tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar de'i chos kyi rnam pa dang /thos pa'i rnam pa dang /tshul bzhon la 'jug pa
185a7(mdo sde): sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o//de la shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug dang lhan cig mi gnas te/bcu drug po dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi rig pa'i
185b1(mdo sde): 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//de bzhin du 'du byen dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang //
185b2(mdo sde): len sa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi 'i'i grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//ma rig pa 'gog pa'i 'grogos pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//de bzhin du 'du byad dang //
185b3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sbed pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi 'gog
185b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'grogs pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas so//'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'grogs pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung bar lta bar
185b5(mdo sde): gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po'i bar dag gis 'grogs pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas so//mtho dmon gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan ci ge mi gnas pa nas/'jig rten gyi chos rnyed pa dang /
185b6(mdo sde): mi rnyed pa dang /snyan pa dang /mi snyan pa dang /smad pa dang //bstod pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas so//khro ba dang /2
185b7(mdo sde): du 'dzin pa dang /'chab pa dang /yongs su gdung ba dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /sgyu dang /g.yo dang /ngo tsha med pa dang /khrel med pa khengs pa dang /rtsod pa dang
186a1(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang /bag med pa dang /nga rgyal dang /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /nga rgyalnga las kyang nga rgyal dang /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /chung rmang snyam
186a2(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /leg pa'i nga rgyal rnams kyi 'grogs pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas po nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tir gyi 'grogs
186a3(mdo sde): pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba phra mo dang /sbom po dang /tshur ngu dang /'bring dang /chen po'i'i blogs
186a4(mdo sde): pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba'i thams cad kyi bar gyi 'phrogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//gti mug gi mun pa dang /rab
186a5(mdo sde): rib kyi lding tig dang /sgrub pa dang /chod pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/nyams par 'gyur ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos kun nas ltung ba thams cad
186a6(mdo sde): kyi bar gyi 'phrogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'dod pa dang /thab mo'i rnyog pa dang /phung po dang /nyon mongs pa dang /'chi bdag dang /lha'i bu'i dadud rnams
186a7(mdo sde): dang /lhan cig mi gnas pa nas bdud kyi las thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so//bdag dang /sems can dang /srog dang /gos po dang /skyes bu dang /
186b1(mdo sde): gang zag dang /shed lngas skyes dang /shed bur 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kA r+ya dang lhan cig mi
186b2(mdo sde): gnas so//las kyi sgrib po dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /lta bu'i sgrib pa dang /'gro bI'i sgrib pa dang /rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang /shes
186b3(mdo sde): pa'i sgrib pa dang /lhan cig mi gnas pa nas bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang /lhan cig mi gnas so//rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang
186b4(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa dang /mtshan ma dang /dmigs pa dang /mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /bye brag med pa dang /rnam pa rig pa rnams dang /lhan cig mi gnas pa nas
186b5(mdo sde): dud pa dang /sgro btags pa thams cad kyi bAr dang lhan cig me gnas so//bdug dang rtag pa dang /gtsang ba dang /badre ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas
186b6(mdo sde): na ci log thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi dranas so//sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad lci bzhi stong dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi

187a1(mdo sde): /dang /skyon 'grus drug/rnam par gru ming ba dang /bsam gtan dang /'chal pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/pha rol tu phyin

187b1(mdo sde): pa nas/mtshan ma yod la byed pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so//shes rab ni gang rgyu ba med pa/lus med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/mtshan ma med pa/'dus

187b4(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa//de la shes rab kyi yul gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos brgyad la mkhas pa'o//de la chos brgyad lnga mkhas pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phung

188a1(mdo sde): spyan gdang /ma bskrun pa dang /rnam btsun pa /garngug/ pA /TIg go spyad dang /b+hazlag sag na bstan pa dang /smung

188a3(mdo sde): ni/dang thug ma yin no//da bru~M rjes pa'i rang byezhin gang min pa gzugs kyi dang bzhin yang de yin te/gang 'di la mkhas pa dani phung po la mangs dkris bya/

188a6(mdo sde): hrIH/klung 'brel la pa byung drub sems du 'dzi la ma //nga ba rnams na ni lam sna \u0f7fm+b+ha/rmi lAm yang byungadag ma yim sems
188a7(mdo sde): ma yis/srog yin/gsopa mchod/skyes bum min/gang zag ma mi nan rmi lam gyi nga yin na gang yin bzung rnams kyi rang bzhin med du yin/
188b1(mdo sde): labs paden/byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la ma kha gnas bya/ ston pa sanan myu //blan slong dag ma yin/sems can ma sbyim/skrag ma man/gas
188b2(mdo sde): ma yin/skyes tha ma yin/gang zag ma yin no//blug r+b+ha'i rang ponan gang smin pa bye pon pa na ming de yin te/gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni/byang chub sems pa
188b3(mdo sde): chung ba la mkhas pa zhes byu//phung po rnams ni mi ga yor lta khra ste/mig slong byung ba ma min/sems can ma yin/srog ma yin/gsogs man/skyes rnam smin/
188b4(mdo sde): bya thugs sbyin no//mgo yar gyi ring ba'i na gang rin pardung po rnams kyi rang bzhin mad de min te/gla 'di la mkhas pa 'din rgyu chub sems pa'i sla mtshakhas pa

188b6(mdo sde): gzugs brtan pa bzhin gang ldan pa dang po rnams kyi nga bzhin du min te/rlung 'di sa ngas pa ni byung chub sems dpa'i phreng la gakhas pa nas
188b7(mdo sde): rnams ni bral pa dus/la pani bdag mo rin/sems can mi min/sbyin pa man/gis ma /skyes drim med/gleng zugs yin no//sprul
189a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//phung po zhes bya ba de ni
189a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten te/'jig rten kyang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do//'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa'o//rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba'o//rang bzhin
189a3(mdo sde): gyis stong pa'o//rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'o//rang bzhin gyis zhi ba ste/gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//dri la byang chub
189a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na gang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes so//chos kyi dbyings ni sa'i khams yin mod kyi/chos kyi dbyings sla ba'i mtshan nyid

189b1(mdo sde): byedams yin mod kyi/chos sa sna ma lda no//sa kyi byings mas na sa rlung bar spyod pa'i mtshan /

189b7(mdo sde): dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khoms yin mod kyi/chos kyi dbyings chos so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no//chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mo

190b2(mdo sde): yin mod kyi/chos kyi dbyings chos su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no//chos kyi dbyings dang /bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so//chos kyi dbyings dang /'dod pa'i khams

191b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang skye mched la mkhas pa ni/mig gi skye mched ni/bdag dang badrag gis stong ngo //dri bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang /sna'i skye mched dang //

191b6(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi skye mched dag kyang bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du/mig ni bdag dang /bdag gis stong ste/'di ni de'i rang bzhin no//de bzhin

192a1(mdo sde): rnams ni badrug dang /bdag gis skyong ste/'di ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa'o//'di ltar gang skye mched rnams 'bri bar mi byed cing /dge ba'i
192a2(mdo sde): chos kyang mi sogs/mi dge ba'i chos kyang 'bri bar mi byed la/dge ba dang /mi dge ba la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpo'i skye mched la mkhas/
192a3(mdo sde): pa'o//mig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang /rten ni gzugs kyi skye mched de/ge ngo mig gzugs la 'dod chags dang grol bar mthong la 'dod tshogs dang bral
192a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched lo mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched kyi sgra'i skye mched dang /sna'i skye mched kyi
192a5(mdo sde): dri'i skye mched dang /lce'i skye mched kyi ro'i skye mched dang /lus kyi skye mched kyi reg pa'i skye mchod dang /yid kyi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang /rti ni ni chos kyi
192a6(mdo sde): skye mched de/gang yid chos las 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong lalo/'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'i skye
192a7(mdo sde): mo ched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//skye mched ces bya ba ni/'phags pa'i skye mched dang /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched do//de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni ga lam
192b1(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrub pa'o//'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang lom dang mi mthun pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas lam dang mi mthun pa la spyod pa'i sems
192b2(mdo sde): can rnams li snying rje chen po skyed cing /lam gyi skye mi ched kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems ngo bo'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la
192b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang zhe na/'jug pa bzhi ni/byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin te/'jug po bzhi gang zhe na/gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes
192b4(mdo sde): prA dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa'o//de la sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang phung po rnams ni mi skye bar shes pa'o//kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya ba ni/
192b5(mdo sde): de ngo sred pa legs par 'joms pa'i shes pa'o//'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni mi rig pa dang /bag la nyal ba rna mos mi 'byung ba'o//lam shes pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid
192b6(mdo sde): du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la sgro mi 'dogs pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'phags pa'i badren pa bzhi po de dag la de lta bus
192b7(mdo sde): shes rab dang /ye shes kyis rab tu shes kyang sems can la blta bya'i phyir/ smyonasu d+hA mi byed cing /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/'di ni byang chub
193a1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i badren pa rnam pa gsum ste gsum gang zhe na/gang 'di kun rdzob kyi bden
193a2(mdo sde): pa dang /don dam pa'i bden pa dang /mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o//de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang zhe na/'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang /yi ge dang /sgra dang /brdas bstan pa
193a3(mdo sde): ji snyed pa'o//don dam pa'i bden pa ni/gang la sems kyi rgyu med pa ste/yi ge lta ci smos/mtshan nyid kyi bden pa ni/gang 'di mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig
193a4(mdo sde): pa ste/mtshan nyid gcig po'ang mtshan nyid med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo//don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum
193a5(mdo sde): du byed pa'ang mi ltung /mtshan nyid kyi bden pas/bden pa gcig tu rtogs kyang /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
193a6(mdo sde): bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang bden pa rnam pa gnyis te/rnam pa gnyis po gang zhe na/gang 'di tha snyed kyi bden pa dang /don dam pa'i bden pa'o//de la
193a7(mdo sde): tha snyad kyi bden pa ni/dus su bden par smra ba ste gang 'di sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /'gog pa'i bden pa dang /lam gyi bden pa dang

193b2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rtag tu chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/de'i rigs ni rtag pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' tha snyad kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo//don dam pa'i

193b4(mdo sde): pa ni gcig ste/gnyis su med do//de la bden pa gcig ni gang 'di chos thams cad la sgro 'dogs pa med cing sgro 'dogs par ltung ba'i sems can rnams kyang bden pa la rab tu
193b5(mdo sde): 'dzud pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i sgro 'dogs pa'i bden pa bstan pas kyang mi skyo la/sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i bden pa gcig bstan pa'ang mngon sum du mi byed cing /sems
193b6(mdo sde): can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang phung po lnga rnams la

194a1(mdo sde): //gang phung po lnga'i srid pa'i r+g+ha dang /k+ta ba'i thub la nyal ba /rgyun nas ng+yag/gang gis srid pa'i dang /lta ba'i na de sa

194a3(mdo sde): de'agags nas/snron gyi man+dAr mi n+ya shA dang / ma'i ma'i mi m+bI ba dang /de ltar byung bar phyin pa med pa 'di ni'i geg pa 'bogs pa'i bden pa ste/de la gang gis
194a4(mdo sde): deltar shes pa 'di ni/'gog pA la 'grog par shes pa 'phags pa'i badren pa zhes 'o/lam gong la brten te sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /

194b1(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed cing rig par shes pa 'din sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa shes bya'o//tshor ba de rgyu gang gis kun 'byung ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya
194b2(mdo sde): ste/ka gis rgyu de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di na kun 'byung ba la kun 'thung ba 'phyags pa'i ngo dan pa zhes bya'o//gang tshor ba thams cad rgyun ched de tsher ba med
194b3(mdo sde): 'ang rgyar zhing /tshor ba 'gazhi pa la'ang rtog le sems can ma lte ba'i phyir/tshor po 'gog pa mngon sum du nga byed pa 'do ni 'gog pa la 'gog par shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa

195a1(mdo sde): med pa ste ma skye ba ni 'gog pa'o//gang ma skyes pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med do//gang 'aklog pa med par shes pa 'di ni zad pa'i 'gog pa 'phags pa'i

195b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'am/'khor ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'am/mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu las byung ba de dag thams cad/byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
