272a3(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i gzi brjid kyi tshogs dang /stobs bskyed pas bdag gri bai rgyal dang //rgyags /dgus pa rnams bcom pas chos smra ba de dag bsrung po dang /
272a4(mdo sde): bskyab pa dang /skya par dam bca'o//gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod po der sems bskyed pa'i bag tsam gyis kyang bar chud bgyid du mi mtsho'o//de nas bcom
272a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis gzung
272a6(mdo sde): zhig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/byang chub
272a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyon dge'
272b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri d+haswA par rnam par dbye ba'i phyir snying las chung ngur gyis shig/'khor 'di na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcur rgyas par byed pa dang /dam
272b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o dag chags shing 'khod do//de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus dram pa'i chos yongs su gzung
272b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'dus po chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du mi
272b4(mdo sde): lus par rdzogs shing rgyas par bgyi'o//'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dri na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dam po'i chos yongs su gzung ba
272b5(mdo sde): dang /dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bgyid de/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi
272b6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' glang dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba dang /'dzin pa dang /'chung ba dang //klog pa dang /ston pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
272b7(mdo sde): byams pa'i byin gyo brlabs su rig par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsol po/skyes bu dam
273a1(mdo sde): pa dag ji ltar khyed da ltar nga'i mdun na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par langs pa de bzhin du khyod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
273a2(mdo sde): snyed kyi spyan sngar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par langam pa legs so legs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi
273a3(mdo sde): zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag blo zhan pas bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ro don dang /tshig dang /yi ge yongs su rdzogs par
273a4(mdo sde): ma bgyis pa lta na bcom ldan 'das dang /mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la bdag bzod pa gsol to//bcom
273a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/blo gros mi zad pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrib pa med pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dang /chos dang /nges pa'i
273a6(mdo sde): tshig dang /spobs pa rnams la 'khrul pa med do//'gog pa la'ang 'khrul pa meng ngo //gang dog chos 'di lta bu dag rtogs par khong du chud pa'i skyes bu dam pa de
273a7(mdo sde): ngag ni yang dag pa'i don rnam par nges pa thob pa yin no//blo gros mi zad pa khyod ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i dam pa'i mchog thob cing dbang rnyed po/theg pa
273b1(mdo sde): chen po 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'dzag cing rnam par nges pa'i dam pa'i mchog thob pa ste/blo gros mi rjong pas 'od thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lus kyi 'khrul pa 'am/
273b2(mdo sde): ngag gi 'khrul pa 'am/sems kyi 'khrul pa gang yang med do//de dag thams cad na ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin no//blo
273b3(mdo sde): gros mi zad pa khyod ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong mang pos chos bstan pa'i phyir rjes su dgengs so//blo gros mi zad pa nga lta bu rnams kyis khyod 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa
273b4(mdo sde): rnams la shin tu bzod do//de nos bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangaso 'di'i ming tso lags/'di
273b5(mdo sde): ji lta bur gzung bar bskye/bcom ldanA ra des kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang /don dang tshig
273b6(mdo sde): dang yi ge mi zad la bstan pa dang /'dus pa chen po'i le'u dang /blo gros mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya bar phyung gzung zhig ci \u0f7f/kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'dzus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos
273b7(mdo sde): kyirnam grangs 'di gzung na de las chos la dran pa'i stobs kyi mthu bskyed pa 'brum 'gyur du thob por 'gyur ro//gzhan dag la'ang bstan na sems can thams cad la sangs
274a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bya bas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang
274a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang /glan sa brten shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /dge slong de dog dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
274a3(mdo sde): lho dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyod do//'dus pa chen po'i la

274a6(mdo sde): nyin thos dang /ring srungs rgyas 'das pa dang /da ltar gyi dang /ma byon pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom
274a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das yangs pa'i grong khyer na a mra srung ba'i tshal na/dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugas+tha te/thams cad kyang
274b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa//
274b2(mdo sde): glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems
274b3(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig ste/mngon
274b4(mdo sde): par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa las nges par byung ba/sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi
274b5(mdo sde): brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/chos kyi grong khyer srung ba/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/phyogs bcur ska shin tu bsgrags pa/
274b6(mdo sde): gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge bo'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun myi 'chad par byed pa/bdud dang phyir rgol pa bcom
274b7(mdo sde): pa pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa dang /ting nge dang /gadru so dang /skyebs pa phun sum tshogs
275a1(mdo sde): pa/sgrib pa dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa/spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sbyin pa dang /
275a2(mdo sde): dul ba dang /mi 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /thabs
275a3(mdo sde): la mkhas pa dang /smon lame dang /stobs dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba/mi dmigs pa'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/phyir mi
275a4(mdo sde): ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir rgyas btab pa/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po shes pa la mkhas pa/'khor thams cad zol gyis
275a5(mdo sde): mi non pa'i mi 'jigs pas rnam par gnon pa/bsod noms dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad kyis lus shin tu
275a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa gzugs dam pa 'dzin pa/rgyan dang bral ba/ri rab kyi rtse mo mthong ba bzhin du snyan pa dang grags pas mngon par 'phags pa/lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar
275a7(mdo sde): bsro ba sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mi phyed pang dad bsnyed pa/chos rin po che'i 'od zer las bdud rtsi'i char shin tu 'bebs pa/sems can thams
275b1(mdo sde): cad kyi skad dang /smra ba dang /dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /sgra rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/chos zab mo rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang /mtha'
275b2(mdo sde): med par lta ba'i bag tshogs kyi mtshams sbyor ba kun gcod pa dang /seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing sgra mngon par sgrog pa/chos chen po'i 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/mtshungs
275b3(mdo sde): pa dang mi mtshungs pa'i chos las yang dag par 'das pa/chos rin po che shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i ded dpon chen po drang ba dang /zhi ba dang /
275b4(mdo sde): phra ba dang /'jam pa dang /blta dka' ba dang /rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/sems can rnams kyi 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /sems can gyi bsam pa
275b5(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/stobs bcu dang /mi
275b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa la lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa/ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang /ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i 'obs thams
275b7(mdo sde): cad las rgal bas bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba ston pa/sman pa'i rgyal po chen po//sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga le mkhas pa/sems can thams
276a1(mdo sde): cad kyi nyan mongs pa'i nad thams cad rtogs pa/rigs par chos kyi spyan sbyar ba rab tu sbyor ba/yon tan mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa
276a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par yon tan bkod pas legs par brgyan pa mthong ba dang /zos pa 'bras bu yod pa/sgom pa 'dor ba 'bras bu yod pa/bskal pa byi ba
276a3(mdo sde): khrag khrog brgya stong dpag tu med par yon tan yongs su brjod kyang yon tan gyi chu bo mtha' yas par rtogs pa la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par lto ba
276a4(mdo sde): zhes bya dang /mnyam mi mnyam lta ba dang /ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po dang /chos kyi dbang phyug dang /chos kyi ta go dang /'od kyi tog dang /'od bkod pa
276a5(mdo sde): dang /rin po che bkod pa dang /bkod pa chen po dang /stobs pa brtsegs pa dang /rin po che brtsegs pa dang /lag na rin po che dang /lag ni phyag rgya rin po che dang /rtag

276b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ngo //gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa nas tshangs
276b8(mdo sde): pa ral pa can la sogs mi tshangs pa khri bcom ldan 'das lo lta ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa de dag kyang 'khor
277a1(mdo sde): nyid du 'dus so//phreng chen po ban pas so nas kyang brgya byin khri nyis stong lhags te/de dag kyang 'khor du nyid du 'dus so//de bzhin du gzhan yang dbang /
277a2(mdo sde): tshab dpung che bar grags pas tshangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /'jig rten skyong dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding

277b6(mdo sde): ba cid nga de dang de//nga gas ma kyi nang chen pa 'jug rten gyi khrims na ma can pa da di ra pa rnams dang /dade/ nga /rti dang /
277b7(mdo sde): rlung /chug ni dang /yum 'dab pa dag bams cad kyang rin pargya'i gdugs rtse byeng nyid mye ngan byung ngo //nga gsum kyi chung chen pa 'drig rten gyi lams 'din
278a1(mdo sde): dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang dang /skar ma'i gzugs dang /lha'i gnas dang /klu'i gnas dang /gnod sbyin dang /dra ba dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha'

278a4(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi chos ston pa gang 'byung ba de'ang rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de las 'byung ba'i skar grag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen
278a5(mdo sde): po 'di mthong nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/tshim zhing mgu nas yi rings te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas dri bzhin
278a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag btsal te/myig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod do//de nas li tsai bI gzhon nu dokon mchog 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i
278a7(mdo sde): 'phrul chen po 'ang mthong nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshings su
278b1(mdo sde): cu dang 'di dag des mngon par brgyad do//gnang zhing mdzes byang dra dab ltar yang+yas pa'i spyan//dgongs pa dag cing ni gnas pa rlol byin mchog gnyis//dge ba'i las dusugs
278b2(mdo sde): na tan d+ha mchod pag mi lang //dge sbyong 'i'i lam brten khyod la gag 'tshal lo//skyes bri la mchog 'dren pa'i rdzu 'phrul khyod gzigs shig/bad bar gshegs pa'i
278b3(mdo sde): mchog rang gsal kun kyang gda'//khyod kyi chos kyi bka' mchid rgya che 'chi med 'gro//de dag thams cad nam mkha' 'di yi dkyil na gda'//khyod kyi chos kyi rgyal srid mchog
278b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal//rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi nor kyang stsal//chos rnams rab tu 'byed mkhas don dam ston mdzad pa//rjes kyi dbang phyug chos rgyal khyod la mgros
278b5(mdo sde): ga 'tshal//mchis pa ma lags pa dang ma mchis ma lags dang //chos 'di thams cad rgyu las brten nas 'byung ba dang //'di la bdagra med tshor ba po dang byed med cing /
278b6(mdo sde): dge sdig las ci'ang chud mi za zhes gsung gis ston//thub dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung skyobs can rab btul nas//byang chub mchog rab zhi pa mi 'chi bde ba brnyes//de la
278b7(mdo sde): tshor med sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba med//mu stegs ngan pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis de mi rtogs//rmad byung chos kyi rgyal po lha mi mngon sum du//lan gsum bzlas pa chos kyi
279a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo rnam mang po//shin tu zhi ba rang bzhin rnam dag rab tu bskor//de tshe dkon mchog gsum po dag kyang nye bar bstan//khyod kyis dkon mchog chos
279a2(mdo sde): kyis legs par gang btul ba//de dag rtog pa ma mchis rtag par rab tu ni//khyod ni skye na ni 'chi mthar 'byin sman pa'i mchog/yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang la mgos
279a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal//bsti stang legs par bgyis pas mi bskyod ri rab bzhin//tshul khrims ldan deng tshul khri mos 'tshal la mtshungs par byams//mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs
279a4(mdo sde): shing thugs kyang nam mkha' bzhin//sems can dkon mchog 'di la su zhig mchod mi bgyid//thub pa chen po 'khor rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ni//khyod kyi zhal du rab tu
279a5(mdo sde): dad pa'i yid kyis lta//thams cad kyis kyang rgyal ba rang gi mdun gnas mthong //de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
279a6(mdo sde): gcig rab tu phyung ba yang //'khor rnams kyis ni gsung la tha dad rnam par rig/'gro ba dag gis rang gi don bzhin rnam rig pa//de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas
279a7(mdo sde): mtshan lags so//gsung gcig rab tu bsgrags pa mdzad pa de yis ni//kha cig bag chags bsgos shing kha cig rtogs par byas//som nyi 'tshal ba 'dren pas rab tu
279b1(mdo sde): zhi mdzad de//de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan legs so//stobs bcu 'dren pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs bral khyod la phyag
279b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//ma 'dres pa yi chos rnams nges par rab rtogs pa//'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//kun tu sbyar ba'i bcings pa gcod la phyag 'tshal lo//
279b3(mdo sde): pha rol phyin nas skam la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo//dub pa'i 'gro ba sgrol ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//'khor ba'i 'gri bar ma gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sems can rnams
279b4(mdo sde): dang 'gro bar bzhugs shing kun 'grogs kyang //'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol ba'i thugs//pad+ma dag ni chu skyes chu yis yongs mi gas//thub pa'i pad+mas stong pa nyid ni
279b5(mdo sde): nges par bsgoms//mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rab tu gsal//khyod ni ci la'ang smon par mdzad pa yong mi mnga'o//sangs rgyas dag gi mthu chen bsam gyis mi khyab
279b6(mdo sde): ste/nam mkha' lta bur mi gnas pa la bdag phyag 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das la li tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par
279b7(mdo sde): bsto de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das li tsa bI gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
280a1(mdo sde): tu yang dag par zhugs te/'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang lags zhes sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
280a2(mdo sde): bzhu na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa legs par bshad du gsol/de skad ces
280a3(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gan sA la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/logs so legs so//gzhon nu khyod gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
280a4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dri ba legs so//de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /byang chub sems dpa'
280a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas li tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas
280a6(mdo sde): dang /li tsa bI gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltor nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sems can gyi zhing //
280a7(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du sems can rnams la rgyas par byed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
280b1(mdo sde): 'dzin to//sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
280b2(mdo sde): la 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus snyoms can rnams 'phags pa lta bu'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs
280b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can gyi don las byung ba'i phyir ro//dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'di
280b4(mdo sde): lha ste dper na nam mkha' la ji lta bur bya ba 'dod pa de bzhin du byed mod kyi nam mkha' la ni byar mi rung zhing brgyan du'ang mi rung ba de bzhin du/dkon mchog 'byung gnas chos thams cad
280b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur bya bar 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing byed
280b6(mdo sde): mod kyi/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nu ma mkhar ni byar ma rung ngo //brgyan du mi rung ngo //dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'on kyang bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang
280b7(mdo sde): chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can g.yo med pa dang /sgyu med pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing s+ho/
281a1(mdo sde): de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//sbyor ba'i zhing ni byang chub sem/
281a2(mdo sde): dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i
281a3(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams
281a4(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnams
281a5(mdo sde): skyo bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bsam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge ba bcu'i
281a6(mdo sde): los kyi lam yongs su srung ba'i sngams can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
281a7(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing bzod pa dang /dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi zhing ni byang chub sems
281b1(mdo sde): dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste//de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i chos thams cad 'i brtson 'grus pa rnams pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan
281b2(mdo sde): zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa dang /shes bzhin gyis mnyam par bzlog pa'i sems can rnams skye ba
281b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi gling ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur
281b4(mdo sde): ro//tshad med pa bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang /snying rje dang
281b5(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /btang snyoms la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub
281b6(mdo sde): thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang der rnam par grol ba thams cad kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//thabs mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i songs
281b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thabs dang spong pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun
282a1(mdo sde): gyi chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag
282a2(mdo sde): par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam slob pa shes pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//
282a3(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpe'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan rnams snang bar 'gyur
282a4(mdo sde): ro/mi khom pa brgyad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhung ste/de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song thams cad shin tu chad cing
282a5(mdo sde): mi khom pa brgyud med par 'gyur ro//bdag nyid bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas shing pha rol g+ho ltung ba mi gleng ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang ste/de brang
282a6(mdo sde): chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der lhung ba'i sgra'ang mi grag par 'gyur ro//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dgro pa ni byang chub sems dpa'o sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/
282a7(mdo sde): de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der cho nges pa dang /longs spyod che ba dang /tshangs par spyod pa dang /bde ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gis brgyan po dang /ngag
282b1(mdo sde): ma\u0f7fsa sam/mas mtha/ a rbathaHTha sa na.aHShas thamam kas ka tham \u0f7f mthaamatham ma
282b2(mdo sde): 'jam pa dang /'khor mi byed pa dang /sdum pa la mkhas pa dang /phrag dog dang bral ba dang /nod sems kyi sems med pa dang /yang dag par lta ba dang ldan pa'i
282b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams skye bor 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar nu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ci 'dra bar bsam pa'ang de 'dra'o//bsam pa ci 'dra bar sbyor
282b4(mdo sde): ba'ang de 'dra'o//sbyor ba ji snyed par lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang de snyed do//lhag pa'i bsam pa ji snyed par nges par sems pa'ang de snyed do//nges par sems pa ji snyed par
282b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa'ang de snyed do//sgrub pa ji snyed par yongs su bsngo ba'ang ji snyed do//yongs su bsngo ba ji snyed par thabs rnams kyang de skyed do//thabs rnams ji snyed par zhing yongs
282b6(mdo sde): su dag pa'ang de snyed de/zhing yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no//sems can yongs su dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes
282b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no//ye shes yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no//bstan pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes
282b8(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no//ye shes bslabs pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu de lta bas
283a1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dngu' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed 'do dngas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba la nan tan bya'o//de ci'i 'byor zhe na/
283a2(mdo sde): lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i
283a3(mdo sde): bu 'di snyam du sems te/gal te ji lta bur sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur na/bcom ldan
283a4(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sred pa spyod pa na/de snyoms yongs su mo dag gam+b+ha/ci nus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag par snang snyam mo/
283a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dong ldan pa shA ri'i bra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
283a6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma dag gam ci na dmus lung dag gis mi mthong /gsol pA/bcom ldan 'dres de ltar ma lpags so//
283a7(mdo sde): de de mus long gis nongs kyi nyi ma dang zla bas ni mi nongs so//bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
283b1(mdo sde): tAn N+Di rgyan bkod pa mi mthong ba de ni sems can rnams kyi mi shes pas nyes kyi de la de bzhin gshegs pas nyes pa ni ma yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi
283b2(mdo sde): ni ngos su dag mod kyi khyod kyis de mi mthong ngo //de nas tshangs pa la pa can gyis gnas brtan shA rI'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshogs
283b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su me dag gro zhes ma zer cig/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kI zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste dper ni btsun pa
283b4(mdo sde): bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa'ang kho bos de 'dra ba mthong ngo //de nas
283b5(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i blos tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad nIs smrab so//tshangs pa khro bas ni sa chen po 'di mni dman dang /tshi sa dang /g.yengs dang /ri'i rje mo dang /
283b6(mdo sde): ngam grog dang /'jim ngan gyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo //tshangs pa ral pa can gyis smras pa/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar yongs su ma dag par mthong ba ni
283b7(mdo sde): da pa shA ri'i bu sems la mtho dman yod cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag par nges so//gang dag btsun pa shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad
284a1(mdo sde): la sems mnyam ning sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag pa mthong ngo //de nas bcom
284a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la zhabs kyi mthe bos basman pa dang /bsnun ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma brtsegs pa
284a3(mdo sde): dang /rin po che brgya stong du ma'i tshogs dag rin po che brgya stong du ma so sor bkod par gyur pa 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
284a4(mdo sde): yon tan rin chen mtha' yas bkod pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de 'dra'o//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang ngo mtshar du gyur cing bdag nyid kyang rin
284a5(mdo sde): po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i stan la 'dug pa snum byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
284a6(mdo sde): yon tan bkod pa 'di mthong dma?/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i bgrod pa 'di dag gda'o//bka' stsal pa/shA
284a7(mdo sde): ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni rtag tu 'di 'dra mod kyi sems can dman pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu
284b1(mdo sde): nyes pa mtha par skyon chags par sto te/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dpe nA lha'i bu rnams rin po che'i snod gcig tu rngas za'ang bsod nams ji lta bu bsags pa'i bye brag gis lha'i zas bdud
284b2(mdo sde): nye bar gan so pa de bzhin du sh+tsa ri bu sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes pa drug kyang sems can ji ltar yongs su dag pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas skye
284b3(mdo sde): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyun bkod pa 'di snang ba na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag mar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
284b4(mdo sde): sems skyes so//li tsa bI gzhon nu gang dag l-i tsa b+hi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang lhan cig tu lhagasngo pa lnga brgya po de dag kyang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur
284b5(mdo sde): to/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag brtul ba dang /de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de phyir sngon gyi rang bzhin du gyur par snang ngo //de na nyan thos kyi theg pa can
284b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o 'du byed 'di dag ni mi rtag go snyam du rig nas srog tshogs sum khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
284b7(mdo sde): bral bar rnam par dag go/dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po la mos pa'i srog chags brgyad
285a1(mdo sde): dri bzhi stong yang chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
285a2(mdo sde): tu sems skyes so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o////yang de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na li tsa bI dri ma med
285a3(mdo sde): par grags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
285a4(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa/spobs pa thob pa/mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtso nu pa/gzungs thob pa/mi 'jigs pa thob pa/bdud dang phyir rgol po bcom pa//
285a5(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul zab mo la shin tu zhugs pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba/thab snga mkhas pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/spobs pa dang ldan
285a6(mdo sde): pa/sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la mkhas pa/sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa las nges par byung ba so so ci rigs par ches
285a7(mdo sde): ston pa/theg pa chen po 'di la brtson par byas shing shes par byas pa/shin tu brtags te las byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam la gnas pa/blo dam pa rgya mtsho lta
285b1(mdo sde): bu'i rjes su zhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur te rab tu bsngags pa/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skong ba thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de sems
285b2(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas te/sems can mgon med pa dang dbul po rnams bsdu ba'i phyir longs spyod
285b3(mdo sde): zad mi shes pa/se mos can tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/sems can sdang ba dang /rab tu sdang ba dang /gnod sems
285b4(mdo sde): can dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /khro ba'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bzod pa dang dul ba thob pa/sems can le lo can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
285b5(mdo sde): 'bar ba/sems 'khrug pa'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /dran pa dang /ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can
285b6(mdo sde): rnams bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab rnam par nges pa thob pa/gso dkar po gyen la dge sbyong gi spyod pas phun sum tshogs pa/khyim gyi gnas na gnas la 'dod pa'i khams dang /
285b7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/bu dang /chung ma dang /slas rnams kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa/g.yog bran gyis yongs su
286a1(mdo sde): bskor bar snang yang rab tu dben par spyod pa/rgyun gyis brgyan par snang yang rtag tu mtshan dang ldan pa/zas skom gyis zas za bar snang ba'ang rtag tu bas /
286a2(mdo sde): gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas za ba/rtsed mo dang /rgyan po grwa thams cad na snang yang rtsed ma dang rgyan po la chags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing rtag tu
286a3(mdo sde): don yod pa/spyod pa ya mtshan can thams cad chol yang sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags
286a4(mdo sde): dang bstan bcos kyi rnam par shes kyang rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' lo dga' mos pa/'du 'dzi kun gyi nang na snang yang thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor mchod pa/'jug
286a5(mdo sde): rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rgan rabs dang /bar ma dang /gzhon nu'i grogs su gyur cing tshes bzhin du smra ba/tha snyad thams cad du 'jug kyang rnyed pa dang longs
286a6(mdo sde): spyod la reb med pa/semos can thams cad gdul ba'i phyir lam gyisani mdo dad sum mdo thams cad na'ang snang la sems can rnams srung ba'i phyir rgyal po'i bya ba
286a7(mdo sde): rnams la'ang zhugs pa/theg pa dman pa la mos pa zlog cing theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir tshes nyan pa dang /yang dag par
286b1(mdo sde): rjod pa thams cad na'ang snang ba/byis pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yi ge'i gA khang thams cad tu'ang 'gro ba/'dod pa'i nyes pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smad/

287a1(mdo sde): pa/dbang phyug gi bdag por bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin gyi nang du'ang brgya byin du kun gyis bkur ba/ye shes kyi khyad par bstun pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i nang du'ang
287a2(mdo sde): tshangs par kun gyis bkur gA/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten skyong du kun gyis bkur ba ste/de ltar lo ni byi do mo med par grags pa ched
287a3(mdo sde): med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan te/yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas shing 'dug go/de thabs la mkhas pas bdag nyid na ba lta bur bstan nas de
287a4(mdo sde): land 'dra ba'i phyir yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas rgyal po dang /blon po dang /dbang po dang /gzhon nu'i 'khor dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang /tshong dpon dang /

287a6(mdo sde): 'dre nyid las brtsams nas chos ston te/grogs po dag lus 'di ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa/'di ltar me brtan pa/'di ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba/'di ltar nyam chub ba/

287b1(mdo sde): ltar lus 'di ni nad mang po'i sno dang /mkhas pas de la gnas par mi bya'o//grogs pa dag lus 'di ni cing mi bzod pa ste/dbu brdos pa lta bu'o//lus 'dre ni ring du mi gnas

287b6(mdo sde): ba'o//lus 'di ni sa dang 'dra ste byed pa med pa'o//lus 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste bdag med pa'o//lus 'di ni me dang 'dra ste srog meng po'o//lus 'di ni rlung dang 'dra ste gang zag

288a4(mdo sde): lus 'di ni 'chi ba'i mtha' yin te mthar mi gnas pa'o//lus 'di ni phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched kyis yongs su zin pa ste/gshed ma dang sbrul gdug pa dang //
288a5(mdo sde): grong stong pa lta bu ste/khyod kyis de lta bu'i lus de la yid byung ba dang skyo ba bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mos pa bskyed par bgyi'o//grogs po dag de bzhin/

293b2(mdo sde): mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /gcer bu gnyen gyi bu de dag btsun pa'i ston pa yin te/de dag la brten nis khyod rab
293b3(mdo sde): tu byung zhing /ston pa drug po de dag gor 'gro bar 'phags pa rab 'byor yang 'gro la/lte bar gyur pa thams cad kyi nang du'ang khyod chud cing mtha' dang dbus kyang mi rnyed do//khyod mi
293b4(mdo sde): ma pa brgyad du'ang 'jug la ngal ba thob pa'ang med/khyod kun nos nyon mongs pa dang mnyam par gyur la rnam par byang ba'ang khang du ma chung /gang sems can thams cad kyi/
293b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa de btsun pa nyon mongs pa med pa yin/khyod kyi srin pa'ang rnam par ma spangs/btsun pa khyod la su dag bsod sems sbyin par byed pa de dag kyang ldog par

294a2(mdo sde): pa 'di de las zos nas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji skad pa shed/ji skad su/ji lta bgyi snyar ste/phyogs bcu mun par gyur nas bdag gis lhung bzed ri'i

294a4(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i skal pa la de skad byas na de ji skrag par 'gyur ram bdag gis de la rigs kyi bu de la ma yin no

295a4(mdo sde): pa las byang chub kyi sems stor ba sho stag ste/btsun pa gang po 'di dag la nyan thos kyi theg pa ma bstan cig/nyan thos kyi theg pa ni yang dag pa ma yin te//

300b7(mdo sde): bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa la'ang nad med na/bcom ldan 'das dge bo'i rtsa ba tshad med pa dang ldan ldan pa de la snyun gra la mnga' ste/
301a1(mdo sde): de ni gnas med de//btsun pa kun dga' ga zab ngo tsha bar ma bya bar slar song zhig/gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /gcer bu
301a2(mdo sde): pa dang /'tsho ba pa dag gis thos sa ro//de dag 'di snyam du kye ma'o 'di dag gi ston pa ni bdag nyid kyang nAM ba las skyob mi nus na/sems can+da ni bai dag gi skyabs lta
301a3(mdo sde): gra la nus snyam du sems sa re/btsun pa kun dga' bo grab cing mi snang bar bzhud cing /sus kyang thos sA re/btsun pa kun dga' bo gab cing mi snang bar bzhud
301a4(mdo sde): cig/sus kyang thos sa re/btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ches kyi sku ste/kha zas kyis gsos pa'i lus ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa
301a5(mdo sde): rnams ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku yin te/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gnod pa med de/zag
301a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad las rnam par log pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dus ma byas te/'du byed thams cad dang bral ba'o//btsun pa kun dga' bo de lta bu la nad
301a7(mdo sde): yod par 'dod pa ni mi rigs shing 'dra ba ma yin no zhes mchi nas/de la bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis log par thos shing log par bzung bar ma gyur brang snyam ste/
301b1(mdo sde): bdag rab tu du chu bur gyur te/de nas bdag gis par snang las sgra zos pa sman+d+ha dga' bo khyim bdag lhur sbyin pa deng banan te/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das skyes ma 'du
301b2(mdo sde): labyed pas de'i phyir sems can+da d+hams dum na b+h+ring dbul ba'i spyod pas rnam par 'dul to/de bas na kun dge' ba ma par ma byed par 'i mkhyed le slang sa gag
301b3(mdo sde): mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das la tsa b+hI dri ma med par grags pa dris pa yin 'debs pa bstan pa 'di 'dra ste/bcom ldan 'das de'i steng du bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri na
301b4(mdo sde): mchi bar mi spro'o//de bzhin du nyan thos lnga brgya tsam mi spro bar gyur pa de dag gis rang gi spobs pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/gang dag li tsi Sh+T+ri de ma med par grags
301b5(mdo sde): pa dang gtu ma byas pa de thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa khyod
301b6(mdo sde): li tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig/byams pas kyang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i blo 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o//de ci'i slad
301b7(mdo sde): non/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcigan/ bu yongs su dge' ldan la sogs pa dge' ldan rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la lhan cig tu
302a1(mdo sde): tha sa anathas mtha/a \u0f7ftha.a atham mamkam sa aHtham
302a2(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la brtsams te chos kyi bka' mchid mchi ba'i phyogs der li tsa bI dri ma med
302a3(mdo sde): par grags pa mchis te/de bdog la 'di skad ces mchi'o//byams pa khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs//
302a4(mdo sde): par lung bstan na/byams pa de skye ba gang gis lung bstan byams pa ci 'das pas sam/'on te ma 'ongs pas sam/'on te da ltar gyis de la gang 'das pa'i skye ba de ni zad
302a5(mdo sde): pa'o//gang ma 'ongs pa de ni mi byon pa'o//da ltar gyi skye bo la ni gnas pa'ang med de/'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ltar dge slong dag khyod ni skang
302a6(mdo sde): cig gcig tu skye'o//rga'o 'chi'o//'pho'o//'byung ngo zhes gsungs so//skye ba med pa la ni nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa ste/mi skye ba ni lung bstan pa'ang med/mi skye ba ni
302a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ma yin na byamos pa khyod de bzhin nyid skye bas sam/de bzhin nyid 'gog pas sam/ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gog cing
302a8(mdo sde): skye bar mi 'gyur la 'gag par mi 'gyur te/gang sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /gang 'phags pa thams cod kyi de bzhin
302b1(mdo sde): nyid de ni byams pa khyod kyi'ang de bzhin nyid do//gal te khyod dri lta bur lung bstan na na sems can thams cad kyang lung bstan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyis/
302b2(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba ma yin/tha dad pas rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'i phyir te/byams pa khyod gang gi tshe byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu'i byang chub mngon
302b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thams cad rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro//byams pa khyod gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las
302b4(mdo sde): 'das pa de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das par de bzhin
302b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/de dag gi sems can thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can du mthong ba'i
302b6(mdo sde): phyir ro//byams pa de lta bas na lha'i bu 'di rnams ma brid ma slu zhig/byang chub la ni su dang mi gnos mi ldog gi/byams pa lha'i bu 'di dang byang chub la kun tu rtog par lta
302b7(mdo sde): bde 'dor du chug cig/byang chub ni lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya ba ma yin/sems kyis kyang ma yin no//byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad rnam par zhi ba'o//
303a1(mdo sde): byang chub ni dmigs pa thams cad kyis sgro btags pa med pa'o//byang chub ni yid la byed pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'o//byang chub ni lta bar gyur pa
303a2(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su chad pa'o//byang chub ni yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o//byang chub ni g.yo ba dang /sems pa dang bskyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o//
303a3(mdo sde): byang chub ni smon lam thams cad la mi 'jug pa'o//byang chub ni 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral zhing ma chags par 'jug pa'o//byang chubo ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyis
303a4(mdo sde): gnas pa'o//byang chub ni de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs pa'o//byang chub ni yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa'i//byang chub ni yid dang chos med pos gnyis su med
303a5(mdo sde): pa'o//byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam pa'o//byang chub ni skye ba dang /'jig pa dang /gnas pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas 'dus ma byas so///
303a6(mdo sde): byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang /bsam pa yongs su shes pa'o//byang chub ni skye mched rnams kyi sgo ma yin pa'o//byang chub ni bag chags
303a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas ma 'dres pa'o//byang chub ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral bas yul la mi gnas zhing phyogs la mi
303b1(mdo sde): gnas pa'o//byang chub ni kun nas mi rdung zhing de bzhin nyid la mi gnas pa'o//byang chub ni mang tsam ste ming de'ang g.yo ba med do//byang chub ni blang ba dang dor ba med pas
303b2(mdo sde): rlabs med do//byang chub ni 'khrug pa med pa ste rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o//byang chub ni rab tu snang ba sgre ngo ba nyid rnam par dag pa'o//byang chub ni 'dzin pa med
303b3(mdo sde): pa ste shin tu dmigos pa med pa'o//byang chub ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas tha drid pa med pa'o//byang chub ni dpe bstan pa dang bral bas dpe
303b4(mdo sde): med pa'o//byang chub ni shin tu khong du chud par dka' ba'i phyir phra ba'o//byang chub ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin pas na thams cad du song ba ste/de ni lus kyis sam/sems
303b5(mdo sde): kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i mo nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus ni D+ha dang shing dang /rtsig pa dang /lam dang /mig yor lta bu'o//sems ni gzugs myed
303b6(mdo sde): //bstan du med pa/rten med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de nas lha'i bu nyis pargya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
303b7(mdo sde): //ba go kyang srings pa mi mchis par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de'i slang du bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mche bar mi sbyor//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
304a1(mdo sde): li tsa bI gzhon nu 'od bkod pa la bka' stsal pa/'od bkod pa khyod li tsA bI dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig/'od bkod pas kyang gsol pa/bcom
304a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal pa dus gcig na/bdag yangs
304a3(mdo sde): pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung ba dang /li tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa nang du mchi ba dang mjal te/des bdag la gus par smras pa/bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so///
304a4(mdo sde): khyim bdag khyod ga las 'ongs des bdag la smras pa/byang chub kyi snying po nas 'ongs so//bdag gis de la smras pa/byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/
304a5(mdo sde): de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir bsam pa'i snying po'o//brtson po'i las sgrol ba'i phyir de ni/
304a6(mdo sde): sbyor ba'i snying po'o//khyad par khong du chud pa'i phyir de ni lhag pa'i bas mo pa'i snying po'o//yang dag pararo mi brjod pa'i phyir de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi snying po'o//rnam par
304a7(mdo sde): smon pa la mi re ba'i phyir de ni sbyin pa'i snying po'o//smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir de ni tshul khrims kyi snying po'o//sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med
304b1(mdo sde): pas de ni bzod pa'i snying po'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir de ni brtson 'grus kyi snying po'o//sems las su rung ba'i phyir de ni bsam gtan gyi snying po'o//mngon sum du mthong ba'i phyir/
304b2(mdo sde): de ni shes rab kyi snying po'o//sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i phyir de ni byams pa'i snying po'o//gnod pa thams cad bzod pa'i phyir de ni snying rje'i snying po'o//chos kyi
304b3(mdo sde): kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i phyir de ni dga' ba'i snying po'o//rjes su chags po dang khong khro ba spangs pa'i phyir de ni btang snyoms kyi snying po'o//drug mngon par shes pas de ni
304b4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'i snying po'o//mi rtog pa'i phyir de ni rnam par thar pa'i snying po'o//sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir de ni thabs kyi snying po'o//sems can thams cad sdud
304b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i snying po'o//nan tan snying por byed pa'i phyir de ni thos pa'i snying po'o//tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa'i phyir dri ni nges par sems pa'i snying po'o//
304b6(mdo sde): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas spong ba'i phyir de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi snying po'o//'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba'i phyir de ni bdon pa'i snying po'o//ma rig pa'i zag pa zad
304b7(mdo sde): mi nas rga shi'i bar gyi zog pa zadu pa'i phyir de ni rtere cing 'brelaM bar 'byung ba'i snying po'o//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir de ni nyon mongs pa
305a1(mdo sde): tha shA tu rab tu zhi pa'i snying po'o//sems can thams cad ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir de ni sems can thams cad kyi snying po'o//stong pa nyid mngon par
305a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir de ni chos thams cad kyi snying po'o//mi g.yo ba'i phyir de ni bdu thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i snying po'o//'jug pa dang bral ba'i phyir
305a3(mdo sde): de ni khams gsum pa'i snying po'o//mi 'jigs shing mi dngangs pa'i phyir de ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi snying po'o//thams cad du ma smad pa'i phyir de ni
305a4(mdo sde): stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snying po'o//nyon mongs pa ma lus pa'i phyir de ni rig pa gsum gyi snying po'o///
305a5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par grub pa'i phyir de ni sems kyi skad cig gcig la chos thams cad ma lus par khong du chud pa'i snying po'o//rigs kyi bu
305a6(mdo sde): de ltar ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang ldan pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su
305a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang ldan pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i gom pa 'dor ba dang /'deg pa de thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po nas 'ongs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos
305b1(mdo sde): rnams las 'ongs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas so//bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di bshad pa nA/lha dang mi lta brgya tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/bdag

305b4(mdo sde): 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i blo 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcig na rang gi gnas na mchis
305b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshe bdud sdig can lha'i bu mo khri nyis skyong gis yongs su bskor te/brgya byin gyi cha byad kyis sil snyan dang glu dbyangs len cing bdag ga lwa ba der mchis te/bdag gi
305b6(mdo sde): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas de 'khor dang bcas pa byadag la mdun gyis bltas to phyogs gcig tu mchis so//bdag ni de la brgya byin lha'i dbang po lags snyam
305b7(mdo sde): bgyid de/bdag gos de la 'di skad ces bgyis so//kau shi ka khyod legs par 'ongs so//'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la bag yod par gyis shig/lus dang /

306a2(mdo sde): dam pa lha'i bu mo khri tis stong 'di dang /baidag la khyod kyis long la 'di dag khyod kyi g.yog gyis shig ces mchi ba dang /de la bdag bris 'di skad du kau shi ka rung ba ma

306a6(mdo sde): shAkya'i sas la ni rung ba ma yin b+hi sa nga lnga byin cig ces bgyis pa dang /de nas bdud sdig can 'jigs shing skrag nas mi dga' ste/li tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa
306a7(mdo sde): /'dis bdag la dmus su 'ong ngo zhes de mi snang bar bgyi bar 'tshal ba ma nus te/rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan kyang mi snang bar ma nus so//de nas par snang las sgra
306b1(mdo sde): byung ste/sdig can khyod kyis lha'i bu mo 'di rnams skyes bu dam pa 'dre la phul cig dang /dgong bdag gi gnas su 'gro nus par 'gyur ro//de nas bdud sdig can 'jigs
306b2(mdo sde): dang skrag nas mi 'tshal bzhin du lha'i bu mo de rnams phul lo//de nas dri ma med par grags pas lha'i bu mo de rnams blangs nas lha'i bu mo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
306b3(mdo sde): khyod bdud sdig can gyis de la byin gyis de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/des de dag la byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i rjes su
306b4(mdo sde): mthun pa'i gtam bgyis pa dang de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas yang des khyed kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed zin gyis da phan chad khyed chos kyi kun dga' la//
306b5(mdo sde): dga' zhing mos par gyis la 'dong ba la dga'o zhing mos par ma byed cig ces bsgo'o//de dag gis smras pa/chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba de gang lags/des smras pa/sangs
306b6(mdo sde): rgyas la mi phyed par dad cing dga' ba dang /chos nyan par 'dod cing dga' ba dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bar dga' ba dang /nga rgyal med cing bla ma dag la bsti stang byed
306b7(mdo sde): par dga' ba reng /khams kun nas 'byung bar dga' ba dang /yul rnams la mi gnas par dga' ba dang /phung po rnams la gshad mas bur rtog pa la dga' bo dang /mas
307a1(mdo sde): /rnams la sgyug gdug pa dang mtshungs par rtog pa la dga' ba dang /skye mched rnams la grong stong pa lta bur dben par dga' ba dang /byang chub kyi sems
307a2(mdo sde): kun tu bsrung bar dga' ba dang /sems can la phan par byed par dga' ba dang /sbyin pa la bgo ba sha' byed par dga' ba dang //tshul khrims la mi lhod par dga' ba dang
307a3(mdo sde): bzod pa la bzod cing dul bar dga' ba dang /brtson 'grus la dge ba yang dag par /bas par dga' ba dang /bsam gtan la yongs su spyod par dga' ba dang /shes
307a4(mdo sde): rab la nyon mongs pa'i snad pa med par dka' ba dang /byang chub la rgya cher dga' ba dang /bdud cher gcod par dga' ba dang /nyon mongs po rnams nges par gzhom par
